name: Doochoo, Inc.
description: Provider of a database and market research platform designed to create seamless, highly engaging polls and complex surveys. The company's platform offers a survey and social analytics tool, enabling companies to create engaging polls and complex surveys. It also gives users the capability to get social data, customer insight and behavioral analytics from social networking sites.
one_liner: Provider of a database and market research platform designed to create seamless, highly engaging polls and complex surveys. The company's platform offers a survey and social analytics tool, enabling companies to create engaging polls and complex surveys. It also gives users the capability to get social data, customer insight and behavioral analytics from social networking sites.
